full_summary:
### Tender Announcement for Computer Application Support Services

#### Solicitation Information

* Solicitation Number: S4540019
* Publication Date: August 2, 2023
* Closing Date: August 8, 2023, 11:00 a.m. EDT
* Contract Type: Temporary Help Services
* Trade Agreements: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Description of the Requirement

The Department of National Defense (DND) is seeking Temporary Help Services for Computer Application Support. This requirement is open to qualified suppliers under the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR), with the contracting entity adhering to the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

The proposed services will be provided to support the DND's computer application needs and will be subject to a minimum security level of Secret. The supplier must demonstrate expertise in providing temporary personnel services for computer application support.

#### Notice Invitation

The invited suppliers are:

* Access Corporate Technologies Inc.
* Altis Human Resources (Ottawa) Inc.
* ARTEMP PERSONNEL SERVICES INC
* Cache Computer Consulting Corp.
* Calian Ltd.
* CSI Consulting Inc.
* HubSpoke Inc.
* Lionel Drouin
* MGIS Inc.
* Orbis Risk Consulting Inc.
* Randstad Interim Inc.
* SYSTEMATIX SOLUTIONS TI INC/SYSTEMATIX IT SOLUTIONS INC
* TECH4SOFT INC., Expertise Technology Consulting Inc. (in joint venture)
* THE SOURCE STAFFING SOLUTIONS INC.
* Zernam Enterprise Inc.

For more information about this tender, please refer to the solicitation document [link to be provided].

#### Contact Information

For any inquiries or questions about this tender, you can contact CFSG(O-G) Temp Help via email at CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca or phone at (613) 971-7955.
